# Pull Request

## Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of what this PR does.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test improvements
- [ ] Chore (maintenance, dependencies, etc.)

## Related Issues

Please link any related issues:

- Fixes #(issue number)
- Closes #(issue number)
- Related to #(issue number)

## Changes Made

Please describe the changes made in this PR:

- [ ] Added new Deno tool: `tool_name`
- [ ] Enhanced existing tool: `tool_name`
- [ ] Fixed bug in: `component/feature`
- [ ] Updated documentation for: `section`
- [ ] Improved error handling in: `component`
- [ ] Other: (please describe)

## Testing

Please describe the tests you ran to verify your changes:

- [ ] Built the project successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Ran type checking (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Tested with MCP Inspector (`npm run inspector`)
- [ ] Tested specific tools manually
- [ ] Tested with real MCP clients (Claude Desktop, VS Code, etc.)
- [ ] Tested on multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux)

### Test Configuration

**Environment:**

- OS: [e.g., Ubuntu 22.04]
- Node.js version: [e.g., 18.17.0]
- Deno version: [e.g., 1.40.0]
- MCP Client: [e.g., Claude Desktop, MCP Inspector]

Please provide steps to manually test your changes:

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Build project: `npm run build`
3. Start MCP Inspector: `npm run inspector`

5. Verify expected behavior: [describe what should happen]

## Checklist

Please check all that apply:

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the API reference if needed
- [ ] I have added usage examples if applicable
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested my changes with multiple MCP clients
- [ ] I have tested cross-platform compatibility (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not introduced any new dependencies without discussion
- [ ] If I added dependencies, I have explained why they are necessary
- [ ] I have updated package.json if needed

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] My changes do not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] If breaking changes are introduced, I have documented them clearly
- [ ] I have provided migration instructions for breaking changes

### Security

- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have followed secure coding practices
